EmailTemplate.description: New requirement to MTO Triage Team
EmailTemplate.name: MTO Triage New Order/Line
EmailTemplate.subject: New MTO review requirement; {!Case.AccountName},: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello MTO Triage team,
Please review the following requirement(s)
Part number(s) <Insert Part Number>
Quantity <Insert quantity Requested>
Customer Request Date <Insert customer Request Date>
Customer Sold-to Code and Company Name <Insert SAP Sold # and Customer account name>
Contract Number if applicable <Insert contract number>
Customer Service Level (Standard, Comprehensive, Superior) <Insert Service Level>
Business Segment (BGA, ATR, D&S) <Insert Business Segment>
Order Type (Aftermarket, OEM, D&S) <Insert Order Type>
Block code identified (MTO, DPD, Blank) <Insert block identified>
Please reply directly to this message with the decision and pricing (if applicable) for this requirement. DO NOT change the information in the subject line to ensure proper routing.
Best Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
